No! Don't do it! Ahhhhhh! I am so serious! If you want to continue being friends with him, you do not want to ruin your relationship by telling him that you love him. Believe me, If you guys start dating and then decide to break up, that is the end of your friendship. You will never be able to have a decent open conversation with him again. (Speaking from experience here. --< No, I've never dated, but it came pretty close. :)) Plus the fact that you are very young to be in a serious relationship, friendship is much better! The best way to handle this is to become really good friends with him. Then, in time, something deeper might develop. (You might even realize that you don't like him as anything more than a friend because he is not as perfect as you thought he was.) --< Also speaking from experience. Believe me, he may seem perfect now, but you will regret getting into a relationship with him if/when you find out that he isn't so great. Just think/pray about it please.
